name: Keep The Frog
description:
Keep The Frog is a game made for the Mini Jam: Frogs², 

In the game you will play as a frog who is looking for his lost friends in different levels while eating flies to saturate his hunger bar before it runs out in order to stay alive.

The game is a short fun jumping platformer made by DemogorgonXD & Neogg

*All code, art and music were made by the creators of the game
